sentences: Dietrich Kilian (3 May 1928 – 6 September 1984) was a German musicologist.

He studied at the Freie Universität Berlin and earned the doctorate in 1956 with a thesis "Das Vokalwerk D. Buxtehudes – Quellenstudien zu seiner Überlieferung und Verwendung" (The vocal works by D. Buxtehude – study of the sources regarding tradition and use).

He was from 1958 an editor of the Neue Bach-Ausgabe, the critical edition of the complete works by Johann Sebastian Bach, editing, including critical reports, for the rest of his life, on the cantatas (I/13), the orchestral works (VII/3) and the organ works (IV/5–7).
He rediscovered and published in 1963 the prelude in C major by Buxtehude (BuxWV 138).
Kritischer Bericht, Deutscher Verlag für Musik, 1960
von Dietrich Buxtehudes Werke, illustrierte Neuauflage, Verlag Broude International Editions, 1978
